title: Health Resources | Chiropractic for Kids and Families | Vaccination Info
description: We have health resources for you! Keep an eye out for the different resources that we will have for you on this page. Come see more!
cleaned_text: The ICPA mission is fulfilled by engaging and serving family chiropractors worldwide through evidence-informed practice, supporting excellence in professional skills, and delivering [educational resources for family well-being](https://mychiro4kids.com/). Wellness Resources for Children The ICPA mission is fulfilled by engaging and serving family chiropractors worldwide through evidence-informed practice, supporting excellence in professional skills, and delivering Vaccination Information The [National Vaccine Information Center](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Vaccine_Information_Center) (NVIC) is dedicated to preventing vaccine injuries and deaths through public education and advocating for informed consent protections in medical policies and public health laws.
